website_summaries.verdict: These easy-to-digest bisque toppers are fairly inexpensive, contain sunflower oil for a healthier immune system, and each case includes 12 packets. A great budget food topper.
pros: Thick, soft, and creamy bisque that’s easy on a dog’s teeth
Real beef broth and beef are the first 2 ingredients
cons: pouches may be on the small side for larger breeds

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: So I have the worst picky eater. I've lost count of the brands we've tried. She's absolutely horrible! It's been a week and so far she's still enjoying her food with this food topper. I just pray she won't get tiredbofnit like she's done in the past. Few things are different though. 1. She's not just licking off the gravy she's eating her entire meal! 2. No vomiting! She's been a notorious vomiter when she eats wet food. 3. No diarrhea! Besides being the worst picky eater she also has a super sensitive stomach. Over all I'm very happy. I just wish cost would be a lot less. The cost for this toppers is the same as buying 5-8oz cans
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M.

customer_reviews.title: Tiki dog Lola petites flavor booster
customer_reviews.text: I have a small old poodle and I wanted to have something very nice I had been using another brand that I got off and of Amazon and he enjoys that but this for the price it’s just soup it seems and it may be tasty but it’s not a value
customer_reviews.author: Petahappi

customer_reviews.title: Great for my picky dog!
customer_reviews.text: Loved! My very picky "must have gravy" dog gobbled up his food when I mixed these in. The variety pack is a win. He liked all the flavors and no gastric distress afterward!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Packages not easy to get all the stuff out
customer_reviews.text: I gave 4 stars becasue off the packages . It was very hard without getting messy when you are trying to get the meat out of the package especially tuna. Other than that my Frenchie loves it .
customer_reviews.author: Nita Califano

customer_reviews.title: They have almost nothing in them
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my Havanese, thinking they'd be more appropriate for smaller dogs than standard 3 ounce packets. Unfortunately it seems like they have hardly anything in them. It's almost entirely gravy (and not even that much of it). He likes the taste well enough, though. This product just doesn't feel like a good value. I'll stick with the instinct healthy cravings packets and just split them up over a couple of meals.
customer_reviews.author: AMG

customer_reviews.title: Only food my chihuahua will eat
customer_reviews.text: Well I haven’t tasted this myself however it is the only dog food my chihuahua will eat so I gave it a 5 for flavor lol - keep up the great flavor selection so my dog won’t starve cos he’s that picky :)
customer_reviews.author: Mojo Girl

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: I have a super picky dog, who is just not food motivated. I usually have to put chicken or other meats for her to eat her kibble. I bought this to mix in with her kibble and she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: agatha panday

customer_reviews.title: Picky eating continues. 😩
customer_reviews.text: I only gave each topic three stars because my picky Maltipoo doesn’t like it, shocker. Maybe that means I should give all of the topics one star? That doesn’t seem fair since I blame the lack of interest in this food on my dog, not this food. Good luck with yours!
customer_reviews.author: Jeri C.

customer_reviews.title: For Small Dogs
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t paying attention when I bought these. I mix in wet food with dry food for my dog. He’s an Old English Bulldog. I didn’t realize this was for small dogs until I got it. But he still ate it. I just had to use two at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Sam H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for picky eaters
customer_reviews.text: My pup loves these! I got him as a rescue a couple months ago and couldn’t get him to eat his food. This is the perfect flavor booster for him to eat his whole dish. Highly recommended for those picky eaters.
customer_reviews.author: Little Mermaid

customer_reviews.title: Picky dogs happy!!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 shih tzu s that are very picky eaters and this product really did the trick when I added it to their dry food. I am very happy with this product and would not hesitate to order again.
customer_reviews.author: kelli RN

customer_reviews.title: Wish my dog liked tuna. That's a No Sale for me
customer_reviews.text: The broth has a tuna flavoring in every pouch. He doesn't like tuna with anything. Otherwise, broth has a jarred gravy consistency, and mixes well with kibble nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Risa

customer_reviews.title: Great for small dogs
customer_reviews.text: If u have a small dog - this pouch is great - but I needed a bigger size & one is allergic to pork, so I wish u could pick the flavor urself... but still a great buy for a small dog, that can eat almost anything...
customer_reviews.author: Mrs G

customer_reviews.title: Cute package- pets 🤢
customer_reviews.text: Cute package! My dog actually turned his nose up and my cat gagged at the smell when the dog tried to eat it. But - donated the rest to animal shelter.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K Reed

customer_reviews.title: Doggy gravy
customer_reviews.text: If my pup is ever feeling down I put a little bit of this on her food and she slurps it up
customer_reviews.author: Tim90210

customer_reviews.title: Good for senior dogs who need to eat!
customer_reviews.text: This product helps get my diabetic pug to eat so she gets her insulin. I couldnt be more pleased. We just use it when needed to help spark her appetite. Im only guessing on flavor.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wescott

customer_reviews.title: Delicious but expensive
customer_reviews.text: My dog enjoyed these. I added them to her dry food. They’re small so I probably won’t buy them again unless the price goes down.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Product sticks to the packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Half of the product sticks to the wrapping. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Buy a can of tuna instead...
customer_reviews.text: These are cheap but there is very little tuna in them.
customer_reviews.author: dianelizbeth

customer_reviews.title: Where's the flavor booster?
customer_reviews.text: Super thin small pouches. Not much chunky food nor liquid inside.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this!
customer_reviews.text: 2 Small dogs love the flavor. I use this as a topper for dry dog food
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jojo approved
customer_reviews.text: Jojo loved his dry food after we added this gravy mix.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL

customer_reviews.title: A tiny bit of watery food
customer_reviews.text: This is a packet that contains a very tiny bit of watery food. My dog did eat it but not a great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jamaica M White

customer_reviews.title: Great Variety
customer_reviews.text: I use this over dried dog food to add more flavor and make it more appealing and nutritious for my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda L. Curry

customer_reviews.title: Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy these packets at PetSmart. They have really good flavors for my picky eater.
customer_reviews.author: Krissia Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Tasty for pups
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this stuff!!!! He’s the pickiest little pup too, tuna is his fav
customer_reviews.author: Grace Ahn

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan but recommend the can version of it
customer_reviews.text: My dogs won’t touch it... they love the can version of it. The pouch has very little meat and more of a white jelly texture
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Marin

customer_reviews.title: These are fun and both of my dogs really love 'em!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't personally tried them...but my dogs assure me that "Daddy, these are...om nom nom... really...REALLY YuMmY! Haha :D Both of my dogs are picky eaters. So I know when they really like something because they'll eat faster, lick their bowls cleaner, and give me plenty of kisses to show their appreciation. Thankfully these pouches got their approval and didn't seem to upset their stomachs with new foods which happens from time to time when we try new things. I hope your pups approve of them too! :)
customer_reviews.author: Brett T

customer_reviews.title: Pups (and cats) enjoy
customer_reviews.text: Both of our dogs and even our cats enjoy this food topper from Tiki. We often feed them Tiki products, and rarely have a problem with them not clearing their food bowls. Half the box was put in the freezer and turned into doggy popsicles which they love on hot days, and the rest of the packs we use to help jazz up their dry food. When we put this on the dogs' dry kibble, the cats always try to get to the food first. Doesn't matter that it's supposed to be for dogs - they want their share! Just wish it wasn't so pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Radar626

customer_reviews.title: dog asks for seconds!
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with this product! my dog has NEVER barked for more food, with this on top of his kibble he barked and barked until I went to find out what was wrong . He was sitting by his bowl waiting for more! He wouldn't eat it until I put the topping on it . Both my dogs loves this! I liked that it didn't smell overwhelming or bad. The amount of the package was a perfect amount to top their food . I will definitely be adding this to their meals from now on. I would recommend this product to anyone who wants to add variety and flavor to their let's food.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie amzshpr

customer_reviews.title: Variety is the spice of a dog's life
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't want to eat the same thing every day and I suspect my dogs like to shake things up as well. So, I usually add something to their dry food for their morning feeding. I'll usually use a wet canned food but I figured I'd give this topper a try. Both of my dogs ate all three flavors happily. The individual pouches are easy to open and pour but some of the meat sometimes gets stuck in the folds at the bottom of the pouch. This product does have a best by date (just over a year in my shipment) and you have to refrigerate any unused portion in a pouch for use within the next 48 hours.
customer_reviews.author: JoeTAZ

customer_reviews.title: My cats love Tiki...the dogs never had a chance
customer_reviews.text: My cat love this brand and apparently the dog food is also up to par since the cat (who rules the household) decided the dogs couldn't have it and instead, made it his own. He loves Tiki brand food - plain and simple. I thought it was a quirk of his until recently talking to a rescue person who also has a cat who will only eat Tiki brand. I'm not sure what makes the difference but the cat knows and loves.
customer_reviews.author: AnAmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Really Enjoys
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy to get these broths for my dog. I already knew she liked Tiki Dog brand dog food and I have bought it in the past. Whenever she finishes eating, she'll go back to her bowl to give it a couple more swipes just to make SURE she got every bit. That's how I know she really loves it. I'm happy that this contained different flavors so she can have a variety every day. My dog doesn't get much wet food, usually only a spoonful mixed with her dry in the morning. These packets have just the right amount.
customer_reviews.author: AndyFan35

customer_reviews.title: REAL Ingredients. Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: Tiki flavor boosters ROCK! The flavor packets have better ingredients in them than most "people" food. I was pleasantly surprised to see actual food in the ingredients list and no funky chemical junk. The flavor packets are like delicious gravy you pour over dry kibble. It smells like what the flavor is. My dogs were ecstatic and I feel confident feeding them actual ingredients. A++ product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon for EVERYTHING

customer_reviews.title: Our Dogs lick the bowl clean!
customer_reviews.text: Tiki Dog aloha petites flavor boosters work well to get our dogs to eat in the hot summers of Mississippi. They usually just turn their noses up to dry dog food and go back to sleep. Not when tuna bisque gravy is poured into the food. The instructions on each gravy packet are correct. Stir into dry food and watch dogs lick the bowl clean. They are right. That's what our dogs do. They love the stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela V

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs love this special treat at meal time.
customer_reviews.text: We don't use wet food toppers for every meal for our dogs, just a couple times a week for dinner. A little extra treat for them. We've fed them a number of different brands, and Tiki Dog is one of our new favorites. We split one pouch between two dogs. this dog food appears to be high quality and our dogs just love it — the get excited the moment we open the pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Wildness

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor boosters for a picky eater
customer_reviews.text: My dog is picky. Really kinda picky for a little stray. And she has a specialized diet for her liver. This topper makes her dry and bland renal food taste better, without adding too much extra calories. The flavors are fun, and so far she appears to love it. She also likes the tiki internationals single serve food as well. I think I will be purchasing this again.
customer_reviews.author: Serene Night

customer_reviews.title: My Dogs LOVE This Food
customer_reviews.text: I have two small dogs - a chihuahua and a dog slightly larger. These are perfect to mix with dry kibble and my dogs absolutely love it. The broth mixes with the kibble (small kibble) very well and the chunks of meat and veggies make for a good meal. These pouches are very small so don't expect to get a lot out of them.
customer_reviews.author: loveguitar

customer_reviews.title: Zelda Approves
customer_reviews.text: We put this on top of Zelda's regular dry food. She likes the addition of the Tiki Dog Flavor Booster. The problem for the people is the envelopes. They are messy. They have to be cut open. After that, the folds inside make it difficult to get everything out without making a big mess. Cans would work better.
customer_reviews.author: PaulM

customer_reviews.title: WOW  Everyone loves these... even the cats.
customer_reviews.text: These are enormously popular rich tasting pouches of gravy with little bits of protein and other things that I think are supposed to look appealing to humans. The dogs love them, but the cats will steal them. These are treat level yummy and will cause gas and runny poop if over consumed.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: The dogs appreciate these pouches
customer_reviews.text: My dogs seem to enjoy these wet dog food pouches. The broth helps to soften dry food, and anything that livens up boring dry dog food is much appreciated, especially when it is a good portion size for weight control. I have not found anything negative to say about this product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hiatt

customer_reviews.title: Flavor booster for dogs
customer_reviews.text: This 'flavor booster' for dogs is a good way to give an extra treat on top of dry food. Just be careful because there was a mix-up at my house and this was offered to my cat and - to my surprise - he liked this dog food more than his cat food :)
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Boswell

customer_reviews.title: Dog didn't like it
customer_reviews.text: So our older dog needs help jump-starting his eating and loves some of these flavor packets. This one he just wouldn't eat. We tried everything, even scraping it off his food. In the end, we dumped it and started with a fresh bowl and he ate it. So this was just a big fail.
customer_reviews.author: Smartly Created

customer_reviews.title: A tasty treat!
customer_reviews.text: No dogs absolutely loved having this on top of their wet food. They eat it right up. The packet size is nice because it stays fresh, I have little dogs so big cans of wet food are hard to get through. This would also be great for travel. You can have this food topper on trips with no mess. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Taynos

customer_reviews.title: Pups loves it.
customer_reviews.text: This Tiki Dog flavor booster arrived today, I opened a pack and gave each pup a spoonful ,they all loved it. After it was gone they went to each others bowl to see if there was any more.
customer_reviews.author: sandy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to serve
customer_reviews.text: My dogs loved these meal toppers. It takes a few minutes for one of my pups to even touch her food so these toppers made a huge difference. One whiff and she was eating. Perfect portion size and freshness! I like that the broth is liquid so it makes mixing into their foods easier.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Bo

customer_reviews.title: A taste of good things
customer_reviews.text: This adds interest to dry food, and is also good to tempt the old and toothless pets whom we want to keep.happy. It seems to be very attractive and is easy to serve.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to dry food.
customer_reviews.text: My little guy loves the chicken and tuna flavors. For some reason he snubs the beef each time. =/ Overall though I like having these in the cabinet to add to his dry food. I like to spoil him with healthy treats and to mix up his usual dry kibble. Plus, it's grain free which I most definitely look for in a product.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves these tiki dog boosters! The branding is beyond cute and he gobbles his food down now!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel | The Confused Millennial

customer_reviews.title: Most delicious topping to my food ever!
customer_reviews.text: Theodorable.Teddy loves these Tiki dog food so much. It is a great addition to his everyday food and adds a boost in flavor and nutrition. Highly suggest!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Pet approved!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loved these wet treat sticks! She scarfed these things down so fast she barely had time to take a breath haha.
customer_reviews.author: Markie McManus

product_meta.title: Tiki Dog Aloha Petites Flavor Booster Meaty Broth with Chunks of Real Meat, Grain Free Dog Food Topper, 12 pack
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Beef| Size:1.5oz. (12-Pack)Goodbye picky eaters. Hello, happy pups! Topping dry food with a Bisque Flavor Booster is a great way to safely switch up their routine with new flavors and aromas--without causing stomach upset. This grain free dog food flavor booster is perfect to serve over dry food for an added boost of flavor or by itself as an indulgent treat. Each pouch is supplemented with sunflower oil for a healthy skin and coat. Plus, we never rely on artificial colors, flavors or preservatives, so you can feel good about what you are feeding your favorite pup. Real broth is always our first ingredient. Try one of the following four flavor varieties to add variety and interest to your dog's diet or to discover his favorite dog food additive. See the difference that Tiki Dog makes and give your dog the nutrition he needs and the flavor he craves. Crude Protein (min) 5%, Crude Fat (min) 2.0%, Crude Fiber (max) 1.0%, Moisture (max) 90%
feature_bullets: GRAIN FREE – Indulge your dog with this delicious and grain free addition to their diet
DOG FOOD FLAVOR BOOSTER – Serve over dry food for an added boost of flavor or as an indulgent treat
DELICIOUS AND HEALTHY BISQUE – Supplemented with sunflower oil for healthy skin and coat
MEAT BASED TREAT – The first ingredient is always savory, real, delicious broth: chicken, tuna, salmon, lamb, duck, beef or pork
WHOLESOME DOG FOOD ADDITIVE – No artificial colors, flavors or preservatives

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
